''And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. Mike Pence , R-Ind., who is a favorite of fiscal and social conservatives but rejected appeals that he run for president, turned down an invitation to speak at CPAC, where he has appeared six times. At this time, the congressman is focusing his attention on Indiana, Mike Pence spokesman Matt Lloyd said. ''He hopes to participate in future CPAC opportunities as his schedule permits.''
